name: Eggspedition
description:
in this story based game, the rabbit hosts a competition in Easter Valley and the one who collects all easter eggs will be crowned the winner.

in this competition, time travel is there

controls for player:

use arrow keys to control player.

use SPACEBAR to interact with other characters

github link : https://github.com/PhoenixRider8/Eggspedition

keep in mind that the screen width and height is set to 1300 x 768. 

depending on your system screen size, the game size will differ
